physDesc.additional: The recto and verso of folios are numbered with printed Arabic numbers from 1 to 682. In the incipit, a dot is written under the main syllables from the title - forming the contracted title "rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me." The word "kyang" on l. 5 likewise is underlined with a dot, as is the name o the author "blo gros" on 4.5. Lemmata from the base text are similarly marked.
